A thriller unlike anything you've ever seen! The Silent House is an experience of fear in real time. Over the course of its 88 minutes, the story is told unedited, uncut, from start to finish the film. In the story, the father (Adam Trese) and daughter (Elizabeth Olsen), decide it's time to reform the country house that long is not used by the family, the silence inside it is absolute, but it lasts for a short time.
